challenge: Use Dijkstra's Algorithm to find the shortest distance from u to all the other nodes.
check:
var ans = {y: 4, x: 2, s: 11, u: 0, v: 1}
return _.isEqual(JSON.parse(el.replace(/'/g,'"')),ans)
name: Dijkstra's Algorithm

challenge: Use the Bellman-Ford Algorithm to print the shortest paths from 's' to all other nodes.
check:
var ans = {y: 7, x: 4, s: 0, z: -2, t: 2}
return _.isEqual(JSON.parse(el.replace(/'/g,'"')),ans)
name: Bellman-Ford
